title: CHESSMASTER AZIR

embed.description: League of Legends skin concepts for all champions, along with information on upcoming League of Legends skins.

body: I didn't do/make/draw anything, just saw this and wondered: RITO WHY YOU NO FUND DIS SKIN Q__Q

replies.body: This is genius, please Riot make this happen. But they won't. Just like Dragon Master Swain..

There is a compilation of a bunch of could be skin splash arts. Some of them are actually pretty neat.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zWN7OnHI6tg
Pool party zac tho amazing along with the nami she looks like a goldfish
Pool party zac tho amazing
Pulsefire J4 looks like it could be a PROJECT: Jarvan skin!

I love it.

His ult could be the entire backrow of chess pieces lined up and bashing people away.

This could come out with the Azir buff.......... {{item:3070}} 

I cri evrytiem.
Hm. . . that's an interesting concept. . . this game does involve strategy after all.
**This is an awesome skin idea. Azir moves around lane and the map much like a pawn in a game of cheese (or league for this case). I think the play on the staff and his sand is really awesome! **
Amazing skin idea.
Yea this skin would be soo cool, i hope they rito follows through with this person's idea.

i posted this tread earlier but i think it died off

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/hHwn4x6p-chess-master-azir-with-picture
I don't play Azir, but as a chess player I would buy Azir for this skin.
That sounds awesome! :D Azir could be dressed as a King or Bishop, his soldiers could be Pawns, and his ult could be a wall of Knights charging.
Would make more sense if his wall was rooks
I'd prefer to get Necromancer Azir, but this is a great concept.
A necromancer Azir would be awesome!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l8AioTlq4dc
yes yes yes yes yes yes ye sy esy seys e yse yse ysey seyesyesyseyseyseyesyseysey

I'd totally buy that the first day it comes out. At the moment, i'm saving up for Azir but judging by is play style, I think I would like him. I don't want Galaxy Azir just because it's a couple of changes of colors and nothing really special, but this. THIS. Is amazing.
Heck yes

Illuminati 

But seriously, seems like an interesting concept. I dont know why it reminds me of Alice in Wonderland.
Pretty creative.
